actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the testimony of, former Senator Hansen and his past staff assistant in the case of Dow Chemical Company v. United States.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent former Senator Clifford P. Hansen, Patricia Joanne Howe, and any other past staff assistant of the Senator in the case of Dow Chemical Company v. United States. Authorizes such persons to testify in such case, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the testimony of, former Senator Hansen and his past staff assistant in the case of Dow Chemical Company v. United States.
